mapper.select: SELECT category_id AS categoryId, category_name AS categoryName FROM category ORDER BY category_id ASC

SELECT sc.sub_category_id AS subCategoryId, sc.category_id AS categoryId, c.category_name AS categoryName, sc.sub_category_name AS subCategoryName FROM sub_category sc JOIN category c ON sc.category_id = c.category_id ORDER BY sc.category_id ASC, sc.sub_category_id ASC
